page.title: 07HOLSWORTHY POST NEWSPAPER
page.content: This newspaper was established in 1856 and has continued with the same title up until today. The paper is a weekly local newspaper which is published in Launceston on Wednesdays arriving at Holsworthy late Thursday afternoon. The head office is situated at the Western Buildings Launceston. The full title of the newspaper is The Cornish & Devon Post,the Holsworthy Post being the local edition. The contents include local headlines, Market reports,House sales & Auctions, jobs advertisements,forthcoming events ,births,deaths & marriages,sports,and news from surrounding areas. A survey conducted in Holsworthy town showed that the page size was unpopular compared to the smaller size tabuloids.However it is considered good value for money.
